trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Derby
There were no other sightings in Derby on or around May 17th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking along the canal at 11pm sunday 17 march. I looked up at the sky as I so often do. I saw a bright orange light high up in the sky(about the size of venus to the naked eye) for about 6 seconds, it appeared to be stationary and then the light went out. I could just see a spec of light remaining where the orange light had been which appeared to move but then I couldn't keep track of it because it was so small. I thought it could have been a satelite reflecting the sun but I'm not sure. This is my 4th UFO sighting in ten years however each event has been entirely different.
Summary: Bright orange light, looked very high up but remained still. Then the light went out but I could still see a spec and then I lost it.
